posts._title: Joaquim Pedro de Andrade – O Aleijadinho AKA The Little Cripple (1978)
posts.title: O Aleijadinho
posts.excerpt: A brief piece on one of the greatest Brazilian artists of all time, Antônio Francisco Lisboa, the Aleijadinho. An important representant of the Baroque period in Brazil, Aleijadinho was famous for his artistic sculptures and figures made in soapstone, part of the many historical churches and other architetural monuments all located in Minas Gerais.
